description: Deletes a global database cluster. The primary and secondary clusters must already be detached or destroyed first.

parameters.name: GlobalClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The cluster identifier of the global database cluster being deleted.

nested_items.name: GlobalCluster
nested_items.description: A data type representing an Aurora global database.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: Contains a user-supplied global database cluster identifier. This identifier is the unique key that identifies a global database cluster.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterResourceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region-unique, immutable identifier for the global database cluster. This identifier is found in Amazon Web Services CloudTrail log entries whenever the Amazon Web Services KMS key for the DB cluster is accessed.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the global database cluster.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies the current state of this global database cluster.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The Aurora database engine used by the global database cluster.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the database engine version.

nested_items.name: EngineLifecycleSupport
nested_items.description: The lifecycle type for the global cluster.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The default database name within the new global database cluster.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: The storage encryption setting for the global database cluster.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtection
nested_items.description: The deletion protection setting for the new global database cluster.

nested_items.name: GlobalClusterMembers
nested_items.description: The list of primary and secondary clusters within the global database cluster.

nested_items.name: DBClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each Aurora DB cluster in the global cluster.

nested_items.name: Readers
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for each read-only secondary cluster associated with the global cluster.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IsWriter
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Aurora DB cluster is the primary cluster (that is, has read-write capability) for the global cluster with which it is associated.

nested_items.name: GlobalWriteForwardingStatus
nested_items.description: The status of write forwarding for a secondary cluster in the global cluster.

nested_items.name: SynchronizationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of synchronization of each Aurora DB cluster in the global cluster.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The writer endpoint for the new global database cluster. This endpoint always points to the writer DB instance in the current primary cluster.

nested_items.name: FailoverState
nested_items.description: A data object containing all properties for the current state of an in-process or pending switchover or failover process for this global cluster (Aurora global database). This object is empty unless the SwitchoverGlobalCluster or FailoverGlobalCluster operation was called on this global cluster.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the global cluster. Possible values are as follows:

pending --- The service received a request to switch over or fail over the global cluster. The global cluster's primary DB cluster and the specified secondary DB cluster are being verified before the operation starts.
failing-over --- Aurora is promoting the chosen secondary Aurora DB cluster to become the new primary DB cluster to fail over the global cluster.

cancelling --- The request to switch over or fail over the global cluster was cancelled and the primary Aurora DB cluster and the selected secondary Aurora DB cluster are returning to their previous states.

switching-over --- This status covers the range of Aurora internal operations that take place during the switchover process, such as demoting the primary Aurora DB cluster, promoting the secondary Aurora DB cluster, and synchronizing replicas.

nested_items.name: FromDbClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Aurora DB cluster that is currently being demoted, and which is associated with this state.

nested_items.name: ToDbClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Aurora DB cluster that is currently being promoted, and which is associated with this state.

nested_items.name: IsDataLossAllowed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the operation is a global switchover or a global failover. If data loss is allowed, then the operation is a global failover. Otherwise, it's a switchover.

nested_items.name: TagList
nested_items.description: A list of tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').
